original_text: And it shall come to pass, when the Lord shall have done to my lord according to all the good that he hath spoken concerning thee, and shall have appointed thee ruler over Israel;
korean_text: 여호와께서 내 주에 대하여 하신 말씀대로 모든 선을 내 주에게 행하사 내 주를 이스라엘의 지도자로 세우실 때에

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
when the Lord shall have done to my lord
according to all the good that he hath spoken
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말한 모든 좋은 것에 따라

sentences.original_text: and shall have appointed thee ruler over Israel
